TopicTitle: Realism overhaul : How do i select a lunch pad ? (select a different location to lunch)

Articles.Content:
Realism overhaul : How do i select a lunch pad ? (select a different location to lunch) ? Is it possible ?

I got multiple red dots on the planet but how do i select the to lunch from those place ?

Edited February 6, 2015 by cosmos33
You should also have little launchpad icons next to the red dots. When you hover over them, they will state the name of the launch site. Click one to swap to it.

Just take your lunch box and go wherever you like.

I resisted the temptation to say this and failed

Lol good one i just learned launch is not equal to lunch. Thx.

- - - Updated - - -

I don'T have those icons ...
cosmos33: Please follow the directions here, then--all of them.
